Package desmoj.core.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DelayedInterruptException
    If a DelayedInterruptException is caught in the SimProcess.lifeCycle() method of a process this means that the process has been interrupted from "within" due to a previously scheduled delayed interrupt.
    DESMOJException
    General exception for the desmoj simulation framework.
    InterruptException
    InterruptExceptions can be caught when processes are interrupted.
    SimAbortedException
    Exception is thrown to indicate that the simulation has been forced to stop becaus of an error that occured.
    SimFinishedException
    Exception is thrown to indicate that the simulation has finished properly.
